Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 76th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2005...
Injured on 7/31/2005 with a Bruised Foot, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/7/2009, off Justin Duchscherer (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2009, off Ryan Dempster (STL)...
Injured on 9/7/2009 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 7 runs against Florida on 9/8/2012...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/6/2016, hitting .542 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 2016...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/11/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $701,167 per year...
